sentences.sentence: I mean, it was clear he had feelings for me, but he was just too shy to show them. My mother said boys were like that; so I decided to help him out.
sentences.translation: 我知道他对我动心了，只是怯于表达爱意。妈妈说过，男孩子都会这样，所以我决定帮他克服心中的恐惧。

sentences.sentence: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
sentences.translation: 爱情不识藩篱。它将跨栏杆、越栅栏、穿围墙，满怀憧憬地抵达终点。

sentences.sentence: A rolling stone gathers no moss.

sentences.source: 《海绵宝宝：营救大冒险》今日上映

sentences.sentence: Most successful people are unorthodox persons whose minds wander outside traditional ways of thinking.
sentences.translation: 大多数成功的人都并非遵循传统之人，他们的思维方式都游离在传统的思维方式之外。
